file_operations.description: Replace the current pulsing background-image overlay approach with a lightweight live fireworks burst animation layer (e.g., canvas-based particles or DOM particles) that continuously spawns bursts over time; keep pointer-events disabled and ensure it sits behind page content.

Adjust/remove reliance on the existing fireworks overlay pulse styles for Page 2/3; add any minimal, reusable CSS utilities needed for the new fireworks burst layer (keeping clicks unblocked and layering correct).
